moduleMeta.name: dailyResults

moduleMeta.keyword: daily actual evapotranspiration, runoff, snowmelt, discharge

var.name: Eact2D
var.description: hourly actual evaporation at each grid of the study area

var.name: qin2D
var.description: hourly runoff at each grid of the study area

var.name: snowmelt2D
var.description: hourly snowmelt at each grid of the study area

var.name: discharge
var.description: hourly discharge of each flow interval

var.name: nflow
var.description: number of flow intervals of each subbasin

var.name: Eact_daily2D
var.description: daily actual evaporation at each grid of the study area

var.name: qin_daily2D
var.description: daily runoff at each grid of the study area

var.name: snowmelt_daily2D
var.description: daily snowmelt at each grid of the study area

var.name: discharge_daily
var.description: daily discharge of each flow interval
